channel.title: Process-Hollowing on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Process-Hollowing on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: PXA Stealers Evolution to PureRAT: Part 4 - .NET Payload Analysis (Stage 6 & 7)
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: The campaign shifts from Python to compiled .NET executables using process hollowing for in-memory PE injection, AMSI patching, and ETW unhooking to evade detection and establish persistence.
